title: After upgrade, data collection fails for cloud cost data providers
content:
After upgrading the suite from 2023.05 to 23.4, the AWS data collection fails for a cost reporting integration that existed before upgrade. On the Cost Reporting Integrations UI, the elapsed time keeps increasing but the number of collected records does not increase. About more than 12 hours later, the status of data collection moves from Collecting to Failed.

Cause

This happens if the data collection was in progress when the suite was upgraded. You can check the start time to know if the collection was started before the suite upgrade. Post upgrade, the showback pod restarts and causes the in-progress collection to go into a failed state as described above.

Solution

Solution 1

If you see the state is Collecting, cancel and restart the collection.

Solution 2

If the collection is in a failed state, restart the collection.

For information on how to add an integration for a cloud cost data provider, see Cloud cost data providers and Integrate with cloud platforms for CMP FinOps.
